blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

title: okay but
body: Pre-Hogwarts Sirius, a proper, well behaved little boy, he wasn’t allow to leave the house, and learnt that the muggles and muggle-borns were weak, and needed helping. However, when Sirius had to go to hogwarts in a weeks time he got to go to Diagon Alley for the first time, and he looked at the muggle-borns.  They were smiling, having fun, and speaking freely, without punishment, whenever Sirius spoke without being spoken to he got another scar to his collection. They didn’t look weak like his parents told him. He asked what made the muggle-borns pathetic, his parents told them they had no sense of responsibility, they only cared about having a good time, and that they had un-pure, dirty blood. Sirius asked whats so wrong with that. He didn’t eat until he left for Hogwarts. He said a farewell to his parents and ended up sitting in the compartment on the Hogwarts express with a confident boy with round glasses, and skinny boy with scars like his, he must be strong, like his father said he was, and finally a plump boy with mousy hair. After a while, he asked them what he asked his parents a week ago hoping for better answers. They told him what muggle-borns were really like, and how there isn’t anything wrong with them, they were just like him. They were curious to why he asked, he told them what happened with his parents. They then began to tell him why what his parents did wasn’t okay, and that no one should have to go through that. From that day on he decided he wasn’t going to be Sirius Black, future Slytherin Prefect, he was going to be Sirius Black. That’s it, just himself.

summary: Emma Vanity - OPEN Faction: Neutral When the First Wizarding War raged through the shadows of Wizarding Britain, not everyone...
caption:
Emma Vanity - OPEN
Faction: Neutral

When the First Wizarding War raged through the shadows of Wizarding Britain, not everyone was clearcut on the sides they took. Whether through fear or indecision or self-preservation, there were some that chose to remain neutral, loyal neither to the Death Eaters or the Order of the Phoenix. Emma Vanity was one such person. Caught in a war she refused to see as her own, she was just trying to live her life. An impossible endeavour in times like these.

Emma’s story is one of a woman just trying to get by in a world pulling her in all directions to choose a side and fight. A story of choosing loyalties, to others and to herself. A story of decisions, where each she makes could be her last. Will you give her a voice?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

title: Falling stars and broken feathers
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2SnHIvX

by Blxckspiders

Everyone knows who the Marauders are, constantly doing and getting into trouble. But who is the mysterious “moony” that has more than once outsmarted them and never seem to get caught? The Marauders are determinated to find out and end him. Just add a little gay and a mob of overclass homophobes and youre good to go.

Words: 2561, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, James Potter, Remus Lupin, Lily Evans Potter, Marlene McKinnon, Dorcas Meadowes, Mary Macdonald, Alice Longbottom, Emmeline Vance, Regulus Black, Minerva McGonagall, Albus Dumbledore
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Remus Lupin & Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black & James Potter, Sirius Black & Lily Evans Potter

blog.description: 22 year old Dominican and Puerto Rican who can't drive. I draw and make post about different things so heads up. Just head over to FAQ if you need to know more!! Support Me on Ko-fi! My amazing icon by my AMAZING Friend @prrtnrr ( who does commissions!)

summary:
nobody: 
Jk rowling: wizards used wands as dildos

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: Falling stars and broken feathers
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2SnHIvX

by Blxckspiders

Everyone knows who the Marauders are, constantly doing and getting into trouble. But who is the mysterious “moony” that has more than once outsmarted them and never seem to get caught? The Marauders are determinated to find out and end him. Just add a little gay and a mob of overclass homophobes and youre good to go.

Words: 2561, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, James Potter, Remus Lupin, Lily Evans Potter, Marlene McKinnon, Dorcas Meadowes, Mary Macdonald, Alice Longbottom, Emmeline Vance, Regulus Black, Minerva McGonagall, Albus Dumbledore
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Remus Lupin & Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black & James Potter, Sirius Black & Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Bisexual Remus Lupin, Ravenclaw Remus Lupin, Marauders Era (Harry Potter), Gay Sirius Black, Remus Lupin & Lily Evans Potter Friendship, James Potter is a Good Friend, Sirius Black & Lily Evans Potter Friendship, homophobic Snape, Fluff and Smut, wolfstar, I dont know what to tag, yeet
